twitter.title: Juan Manuel Daza - Profile
twitter.description: Full Stack Web Developer with over 4 years of experience in JavaScript, PHP, Node.js, and Python.

about.title: About Me
content: I am a Full Stack Web Developer with over 4 years of experience, specializing in technologies such as JavaScript, PHP, Node.js, and Python, as well as frameworks and libraries like Vue, React, CodeIgniter, Django, and Nest.js.
My experience in music journalism, teaching, and cultural management brings a unique perspective to my work, combining creativity with technical expertise.

projects.name: Pokédex
projects.description: An interactive app to explore and visualize Pokémon data, developed with the group Roofs on Fire.

contributions.name: Colmena Project
contributions.description: Free and secure tools for community media.

whatDrivesMe.title: What Drives Me
whatDrivesMe.content: I aim to grow as an innovative software developer, pushing the boundaries of tech and creativity. I want to build solutions that inspire connection and curiosity.
